ema karuna kiridiya wetha yomu wu ee sathunge hadagabata, unwahanselage awawada, anushasana namathi maha karuna kiridiya da mudahara, poshanaya kara ekiren siyalu duk, dahagini niwimata samath saththis bodhipakshika daham sama wa wangi, hadagab thula athi siyalu dukginii wasagena nagii, arihathpala suwayen paripurna wanna se, apa da ragayangen, dweshayangen, mohayangen wen wu, nokiliti bawa sihi kara, thunwarak sodagena pirisidu kala sahalpath thishathak samawagena sakasanne athi uthum saththis bodhipakshika dharma sihikaramayi.
